meanings.sent1: The authoresses at the book club shared their favorite novels.
meanings.sent2: Many authoresses have made significant contributions to literature.
meanings.sent3: The authoresses' pen names were a well-kept secret.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she joined the ranks of famous authoresses.
meanings.sent5: The authoresses' words painted vivid pictures in the readers' minds.

meanings.definition: Women who write books or articles.
meanings.sent1: Some authoresses prefer writing novels, while others focus on articles.
meanings.sent2: The authoresses submitted their manuscripts to the publishing house.
meanings.sent3: The authoresses' writing retreat turned into a fun brainstorming session.
meanings.sent4: In the world of words, authoresses are the architects of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The authoresses' dedication to their craft inspired aspiring writers.
